TopicTitle: OMSK Space Products - Stockalike Atlas rockets & more! [Omich-L Beta]

Articles.Content:
Do you plan to make the other EELV when you get a new texturer (Delta 2, Delta 4)

Is there also plans to add a mercury retro-rocket and rcs nose cone/parachute?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-14T13:41:50Z" title="06/14/2015 01:41  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 14, 2015</time> by clivman**
This beautiful mod can't end like this! I may have almost precisely zero experience making textures, but if you are interested, I will try my hardest!

> 
> Do you plan to make the other EELV when you get a new texturer (Delta 2, Delta 4)
> Is there also plans to add a mercury retro-rocket and rcs nose cone/parachute?

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111404-WIP-1-0-V0-2-Bloeting-Corp-Tantares-Parts-Pack-%28now-with-100-more-IVA%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111404-WIP-1-0-V0-2-Bloeting-Corp-Tantares-Parts-Pack-%28now-with-100-more-IVA%29)

A lovely mod from PassingLurker for all of your Mercury needs!

> 
> Do you plan to make the other EELV when you get a new texturer (Delta 2, Delta 4)
> Is there also plans to add a mercury retro-rocket and rcs nose cone/parachute?

I'm not sure if Snow White has any plans, but Kartoffelkuchen made nice Delta 2-esque parts in his [Stockalike Expendable Vehicle pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122576-SELV-Stockalike-Expendable-Launch-Vehicles-V-1-0-KSP-1-0x).

Say "Welcome back!" to OMSK!

Because of lack of the texturer I've decided to make textures by myself. And here is my first experience as the texturer and designer.

I present you Omich-L (Laboratory). It's a part of "Omich" space complex which will include also 3-crewed vechicle and supply vechicle.

[**Omich-L beta**](https://www.dropbox.com/s/nhh73vwyzbt5x5s/OmichBeta.zip?dl=0)

Feel free to speak your mind, bugreports and suggestions are welcome.

Low-graphic screens.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/jYfjt)

Some news ! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif) Great to see you back;looking great, courage for textures ! Best wishes ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-08T22:54:37Z" title="07/08/2015 10:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 8, 2015</time> by Herr Rictus Bingo**

Feedback !

It's a detail I just give my point of view. I don't like the soviet poster, maybe change it for a comic poster about kerbals, like an "I want to believe" you know. After that, i like the cozy atmosphere of the lab, on the table why not add more scientific stuff (btw, I love the idea of the uranium bars) or some drawers on wall 

> ![1436397893-dxku4t6.jpg](http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2015/28/1436397893-dxku4t6.jpg)

"*VoilÃƒÂ* " ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Reusable Atlas

![a2.jpg?ver=0](http://img19.rajce.idnes.cz/d1903/11/11509/11509823_4a07bec57533c466448cb56354add4bc/images/a2.jpg?ver=0)

I don't know if this has been mentioned and denied before, but would you consider a stock alike Titan II? I'm totally going to use it to send my Kemini missions to space and to not, oh ya know, nuke the Koviet Union.

> It happened. He leaves us, he leaves internets because of IRL problems. Good night, sweet prince! We'll remember you.![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

Did he say why he had to leave? What happened?

> It's a detail I just give my point of view. I don't like the soviet poster, maybe change it for a comic poster about kerbals, like an "I want to believe" you know. After that, i like the cozy atmosphere of the lab, on the table why not add more scientific stuff (btw, I love the idea of the uranium bars) or some drawers on wall

Thank you for feedback! As for me, I don't want to change anything. But in **Omich Beta-2** I'll make .png texture files so you would be able to vary textures just as you want. Ok?![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Reusable Atlas

Hah! Nice to see someone who haven't forgotten my mod.![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> I don't know if this has been mentioned and denied before, but would you consider a stock alike Titan II? I'm totally going to use it to send my Kemini missions to space and to not, oh ya know, nuke the Koviet Union.

I am really-really bad in photoshop so I decided to make some practice and only then try to make cool things (Such as Titan, Verniers for Atlas, Delta-II and etc.).

> 
> I love the little lab! Thanks so much for it!

I'm glad to hear this.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Did he say why he had to leave? What happened?

Loss of free time because of work problems, I guess.

Ha! My engine in Scott's video!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Rb2lc2fLXpw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Incase anyone missed it, I used this mod as a dependency for my NASA Career Mode total conversion:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127398-NASA-Career-mode-total-conversion](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127398-NASA-Career-mode-total-conversion)

The stock-alike redstone and atlas are invaluable ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

The only thing that's missing is a two-nozzle engine for the Titan II series.

> 
> Thank you for feedback! As for me, I don't want to change anything. But in **Omich Beta-2** I'll make .png texture files so you would be able to vary textures just as you want. Ok?![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

No problem mate ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
A Saturn V should be good for this mod!
I am glad to see this mod is still alive and kicking. I had considered volunteering to help with textures but it turns out that I have no talent at all when it comes to that kind of work.

So long as future textures remain "stock alike" (and don't look horribly out of place when mix&matched with the stock parts the way that the FASA/KW parts look entirely mismatched) everything will stay groovy ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Good news, everyone! I guess, I've found a Ã‘Âandidature for texturer. It gives me a hope to have good textures.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> A Saturn V should be good for this mod!

[SXT](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542-1-0-4-SXT-Lack-s-Stock-Extension-N-1-and-Aero-update-SXT-20-6-05JUL15-KSC-v3) is already have good one.

> 
> So long as future textures remain "stock alike" (and don't look horribly out of place when mix&matched with the stock parts the way that the FASA/KW parts look entirely mismatched) everything will stay groovy ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

New textures will be as much stokalike as I could make. Promise!

> 
> I have no talent at all when it comes to that kind of work.

I've added your mod to OP.

Redstone... Yeah, that was our masterpiece, in that time I and he successfully understood how to make good UV-maps/textures. We could have so much else to do if gods gave us a little bit more time.![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif) I hope new texturer is able to make textures for Titan, but it's too early to talk about this. Also, **SpcAnn** in his last message said that there is chances to return, but he don't know when.

Maybe a 1.875m to 1.25m adaptor for on top of the centaur, and some example craft files

EDIT: I can make some example craft files for everyone.

> Also, I have really *interesting* project, but I need to make caterpillars for it. Is there someone who knows how to make them?

I remembered that I saw this on this thread, and, anyway, I hope it's not too late, but... [this caterpillar mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35147-Caterpillar-Tracks-NOW-OPEN-SOURCE-ALL-FILES-OPEN-TO-PUBLIC) is now open-source, so it might help you learn what to do. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
You have to add the trench smoke to your engines. Its a quality of life thing that I need lol.

> 
> [**Omich-L beta**](https://www.dropbox.com/s/nhh73vwyzbt5x5s/OmichBeta.zip?dl=0)
> 
> Feel free to speak your mind, bugreports and suggestions are welcome.

I really like the little laboratory. Just one little problem:

It has no hatch. Kerbals are trapped inside ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> Maybe a 1.875m to 1.25m adaptor for on top of the centaur, and some example craft files
> EDIT: I can make some example craft files for everyone.

You may make them if you want. Also, thanks for feedback, I'll add the adaptor in the next update.

> 
> I remembered that I saw this on this thread, and, anyway, I hope it's not too late, but... [this caterpillar mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35147-Caterpillar-Tracks-NOW-OPEN-SOURCE-ALL-FILES-OPEN-TO-PUBLIC) is now open-source, so it might help you learn what to do. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

That's not too late, but this plugin is dead. I'll try myself with [this](https://beta.kerbalstuff.com/mod/58/Kerbal_Foundries_Wheels_and_Repulsors_ALPHA) mod.

> 
> You have to add the trench smoke to your engines. Its a quality of life thing that I need lol.

Ok, I'll try to add this in the next version. (With some things for Niemand's RtK:kiss:)

> 
> I really like the little laboratory. Just one little problem:
> It has no hatch. Kerbals are trapped inside ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

It is conceived from the first, just like on the real space station where only few modules have hatch. Then use orbital ships with hatches to get outside.

Some news:

I am terrible designer. I tried to make the original spaceship, but get a bad clone of "Soyuz". So tell me, what kind of orbiter design you want to see? The main requirements: two-seated and 1.25 docking node.

> ![OYjjZdQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/OYjjZdQ.png)

Some WIP things here.![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Any suggestions?
